commands.cmd:
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 rsync -av --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --exclude={'.git','.vscode','.project','.gitignore'} --delete $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}")/ academy:~/myproject/ 
fi

command-runner.commands.Sync source to IBM i:
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 rsync -av --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --exclude={'.git','.vscode','.project','.gitignore'} --delete $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}")/ academy:~/myproject/  
fi
command-runner.commands.Sync logs back:
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 rsync -avz --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --include={'logs/***','build/***'} --exclude='*' --delete academy:~/myproject/  $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}")/  
fi
Run build (summary output):
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 printf '#!/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/bash'"\n\n" > compile.sh ; : '
'; make all -n | tee >(grep -iv crtcmd >> compile.sh) | grep -i crtcmd\|summary | cut -d '|' --output-delimiter ': ' -f 2 ; : '

'; rsync -avz --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --include={'logs/***','build/***'} --exclude='*' --delete academy:~/myproject/  $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}/") | grep -v "^deleting" | grep joblog  
fi
Run build (detailed output):
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 printf '#!/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/bash'"\n\n" > compile.sh ; : '
'; make all -n | tee >(grep -iv crtcmd >> compile.sh) | grep -i crtcmd | cut -d '|' --output-delimiter ': ' -f 2,3 ; : '

'; rsync -avz --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --include={'logs/***','build/***'} --exclude='*' --delete academy:~/myproject/  $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}/") | grep -v "^deleting" | grep joblog  
fi
Run build (debug):
if [[ "${workspaceFolder}" == '' ]]; then 
 echo 'Wrong local workspace folder "${workspaceFolder}"!!'
else
 printf '#!/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/bash'"\n\n" > compile.sh ; : '

'; rsync -avz --rsync-path=/QOpenSys/pkgs/bin/rsync --include={'logs/***','build/***'} --exclude='*' --delete academy:~/myproject/  $(wslpath "${workspaceFolder}/") | grep -v "^deleting" | grep joblog  
fi
